title: Event Spotter
description: This is the final project for my Web Developer Bootcamp at Ironhack. I learned how to build a full-stack application where users can create, read, update and delete events (full CRUD).

title: Melucia Wanderlust
description: This project is a React Vite app with a mock API. It's a destination website where users can browse different locations (full CRUD).

title: Eddie On Tour
description: This browser-based game was build with web technologies like HTML and DOM manipulation. The user can go on an adventure with Eddie using arrow keys.

title: M & M's Recipes
description: This is single-page application build with React. The user can create and manage their favorite recipes including editing, delelte and create recipes.
